Package com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.id

Interface Summary
IdBasedService<DataType> An id based service is a service for which at least one id field is known These id fields can be used to perform find operations
 

Class Summary
AnnotationsFinder Locate various annotations in source code
AnnotationUtils Some utility methods regarding id
IdBasedServiceHelper<DataType,InformerType extends Informer<DataType>> Helper class simplifying the writing of an IdBasedService by providing some helper methods
 

Enum Summary
AnnotationsFinder.Annotations  
 

Exception Summary
BadIdAnnotatedClassException That class various id elements does not allow the correct definition of a simple id : Either the class has no field annotated with one of the Annotations.ID possible values Or the class has too many elements with such annotations Or the class has only one field with such annotation, which is good, but the field is not correctly typed As a remainder, for a class to be persisted using GAE, it must have as id field something like
 

Annotation Types Summary
Id A local id, to avoid the requirement of having a javax.persistence provider
